API Reference

Learn about the available APIs, endpoints, and usage examples for CLAS.

Overview

The CLAS API provides programmatic access to manage and interact with recipes, users, and community features.

Base URL

https://api.clasplatform.com/v1

Endpoints

1. Recipe Management

  • GET /recipes: Retrieve a list of all recipes.
  • POST /recipes: Create a new recipe.
  • GET /recipes/{id}: Retrieve details of a specific recipe by ID.
  • PUT /recipes/{id}: Update an existing recipe by ID.
  • DELETE /recipes/{id}: Delete a recipe by ID.

Request and Response Examples

GET /recipes

Description: Fetch a list of all available recipes.

Request:
GET /recipes
Headers:
  Authorization: Bearer {token}

Response:
Status: 200 OK
[
  {
    "id": 1,
    "title": "Spaghetti Carbonara",
    "author": "John Doe",
    "ingredients": ["spaghetti", "eggs", "bacon", "cheese"],
    "instructions": "Cook spaghetti. Mix eggs and cheese. Add bacon. Combine."
  },
  ...
]

POST /recipes

Description: Create a new recipe.

Request:
POST /recipes
Headers:
  Content-Type: application/json
  Authorization: Bearer {token}
Body:
{
  "title": "Pancakes",
  "ingredients": ["flour", "milk", "eggs", "sugar"],
  "instructions": "Mix ingredients. Heat pan. Pour batter. Flip when bubbles form."
}

Response:
Status: 201 Created
{
  "id": 2,
  "title": "Pancakes",
  "author": "Jane Smith",
  "ingredients": ["flour", "milk", "eggs", "sugar"],
  "instructions": "Mix ingredients. Heat pan. Pour batter. Flip when bubbles form."
}

Authentication

All API requests require an access token. Include the token in the Authorization header:

Authorization: Bearer {token}
